title: Fist of the North Star: Ken’s rage 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The collaboration between the popular action manga "Fist of the North Star" and the awesome Warriors series is back, packing more punch and exploding action than ever before!

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Additional Scroll 1
childDownloads.description: The clothes worn in the original manga when Kenshiro visits the Land of Shura are now available as　downloadable content.

childDownloads.title: Additional Scroll 1
childDownloads.description: A downloadable Scroll set to be used by Kenshiro. Equip the Scrolls to raise Kenshiro's abilities.The set contains 5 Scrolls, all of which should be useful in the opening part of Legend Mode.

childDownloads.title: Additional Scroll 2
childDownloads.description: A downloadable Scroll set to be used by Kenshiro. Equip the Scrolls to raise Kenshiro's abilities. The set contains 5 Scrolls, all of which should be useful in the latter part of Legend Mode and Dream Mode.

childDownloads.title: Amiba - Playable Character
childDownloads.description: Fight as an additional playable character, Amiba

childDownloads.title: Bat - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn in the original manga by Bat of the Hokuto Army is now available as downloadable content!

childDownloads.title: Celestial Emperor Costume Set
childDownloads.description: The costumes worn by Bat, Rin, Ein and Falco in the original manga are now available as downloadable content for use within "Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage 2"

childDownloads.title: Ein - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn in the original manga by the brawler Ein is now available as downloadable content!

childDownloads.title: Falco - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn in the original manga by Falco of Gento Koken is now available as downloadable content!

Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". childDownloads.title: Han - Playable Character
childDownloads.description: Fight as an additional playable character, Han.

childDownloads.title: Hyou - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn in the original manga by Hyou of Hokuto Ryuken is now available as downloadable content!

childDownloads.title: Juda - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn by Juda, Star of Enchantment and one of The Six Masters of Nanto, in the original manga, is now available for download

childDownloads.title: Kaioh - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn in the original manga by Kaioh of Hokuto Ryuken is now available as downloadable content!

childDownloads.title: Land of Shura Costume Set
childDownloads.description: The costumes worn by Shachi, Hyou and Kaioh in the original manga are now available as downloadable content for use within "Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage 2"

childDownloads.title: Nameless Shura - Playable Character
childDownloads.description: Fight as an additional playable character, Nameless Shura.

childDownloads.title: New Mission 1
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "Forgotten Love", will be made available. Rin has been struck in her "Shikanhaku" Destructive Point, which causes her to lose all of her memories and immediately fall in love with the first person she sees after waking up. Defeat the

childDownloads.title: New Mission 10
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "Renegades United", will be made available. This quest has you searching the battlefield for treasure along with Ein and Juza, The more enemies you defeat within the time limit, the better the treasure will be.

childDownloads.title: New Mission 2
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "Say our names!", will be made available. Jagi and Amiba, the pair that ran rampant through "Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage", are back. Aim for victory over the new enemies that they have brought along with them.

childDownloads.title: New Mission 3
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "The Mighty Ken-oh Army", will be made available. By orders of their leader Raoh, the Ken-oh Army soldiers are attempting to halt your progress. Fight your way through these incredible odds in order to earn the right to challenge Raoh

childDownloads.title: New Mission 4
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "The End Justifies the Means", will be made available. Motorcycles, flamethrowers, bow guns, and more... Defeat these enemies who will use any advantage available to win a fight

childDownloads.title: New Mission 5
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "Bikers of the Apocalypse", will be made available. Become a messenger and use your motorcycle to deliver messages around the map. Move as quickly as possible while using your motorcycle to defeat the powerful enemies that stand in yo

childDownloads.title: New Mission 6
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "Size Matters", will be made available. Is bigger truly better? This quest challenges you to defeat the larger characters from "Fist of the North Star: Ken's Rage 2". A tank protects a vital base, and the final boss is of course the largest character there is.

childDownloads.title: New Mission 7
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "The Life of a Shura", will be made available. This quest focuses on defeating 1,000 Shuras that have attacked you. A new Shura more powerful than even the Shura Generals themselves is about to be born.

childDownloads.title: New Mission 8
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "Legendary Lothario", will be made available. Defeat the scores of enemies who have attacked the village upon hearing rumors that it is solely populated by women. Display your might in order to win these ladies' hearts

childDownloads.title: New Mission 9
childDownloads.description: The challenge quest, "The Sport of Kings", will be made available. This quest has you facing off against a large enemy army with only your trusty steed by your side. Man and horse become one as you race across the battlefield.

childDownloads.title: New Mission Pack 1
childDownloads.description: This set includes the downloadable Quests, "Forgotten Love", "Say our names!", "The Mighty Ken-oh Army", "The End Justifies the Means" and "Bikers of the Apocalypse"

childDownloads.title: New Mission Pack 2
childDownloads.description: This set includes the downloadable quests, "Size Matters", "The Life of a Shura", "Legendary Lothario", "The Sport of Kings" and "Renegades United".

childDownloads.title: Playable Characters Full Set
childDownloads.description: Bundle pack of the three additional characters, Amiba, Han and Nameless Shura.

childDownloads.title: Raoh`s Legend - Costume Set
childDownloads.description: A set of costumes from the original manga, for characters which appear in "Fist of the North Star: Ken'sRage 2," now available for download. Features costumes for Juda, Shew, Ryuga, Fudo and Juza!

childDownloads.title: Rin - Original Costume
childDownloads.description: The costume worn in the original manga by Rin of the Hokuto Army is now available as downloadable content!
